advantages.name: 4 - Disadvantages
advantages.notes: Choose a total of -10 Points from the following:

children.name: Mania
children.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to do something to satisfy your mania

children.name: Obsession - Choose Quirk, Short Term, Long Term
Obsession
children.notes: ; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

children.name: Obsession
children.notes: ; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

children.name: Overconfidence

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

children.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

children.name: Trademark - Choose Quirk, Simple or Complex

skills.name: 5 - Choose one of the following Skills:

children.name: Judo
children.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

skills.name: 6 - Choose one of the following Skills:
7 - Choose two of the following Skills:

children.name: Armoury - Pick One: Body Armor or Melee Weapons
Artist - Pick One: Pottery, Sculpting or Woodworking
Hazardous Materials - Pick One: Biological, Chemical, Magical, Nanotech, Nuclear
Innate Attack - Pick One: Beam, Breath, Gaze, Projectile

notes.text:
500 points - Your powers involve the manipulation of objects or substances, often including the creation of objects from substances. You’re not as versatile as an improviser, but creative use of your powers lets you perform feats that aren’t obvious.

Earth and Air are only two of the options for shapers; others include Water, the Chinese elements of Wood and Metal, and chemical reactions in general. For Fire, see the Blaster template. The list of skills is broad enough to fit many different themes. A less powerful Shaper can have much weaker versions of the core abilities for these powers; a more formidable one can have more potent versions, including Create.
